gate.jape.constraint

Interface ConstraintPredicate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConstraintPredicate, AbstractRegExpPredicate, ComparablePredicate, ContainsPredicate, EmbeddedConstraintPredicate, EqualPredicate, GreaterEqualPredicate, GreaterPredicate, LesserEqualPredicate, LesserPredicate, NotContainsPredicate, NotEqualPredicate, NotRegExpFindPredicate, NotRegExpMatchPredicate, NotWithinPredicate, RegExpFindPredicate, RegExpMatchPredicate, WithinPredicate

    public interface ConstraintPredicate
extends Serializable
    A predicate defines a single boolean operation on an Annotation or some property of an annotation. These are also referred to as attributes of a constraint.

    Implementors will determine if a provided annotation matches the predicate based on the intent of the operator (equals, not equals, greater than, etc).

    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    esword
